job_tasks.phrase: ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core backend engineering responsibilities focused on building and maintaining robust and scalable software systems, specifically those that are integrated with AI and LLM infrastructure. This aligns with the definition of building backend services and ensuring applications are robust and scalable.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses on backend software engineering tasks (scalability, reliability of systems) which fall under Macro-Category A. The systems are explicitly stated to be integrated with LLM and traditional AI models, making it an AI-adjacent role. No tasks from Macro-Category B are mentioned.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear about the backend focus and the context of AI integration, but lacks specific details about the nature of the integration or the AI technologies involved, which would be needed for a perfect score.
